もって瞑すべし: (もってめいすべし) - one can now rest in peace; one ought to be contented with what has been accomplished
もっと: (もっと) - (some) more; even more; longer; further
もっともらしい顔: (もっともらしいかお) - dignified expression; solemn expression; serious expression
もっと沢山: (もっとたくさん) - a lot more; much more; and then some; and plenty more than that
もつ: (もつ) - entrails; giblets; guts; internal organs
もつれ合う: (もつれあう) - to entangle themselves together (e.g. of butterflies); to be intertwined
もつれ込む: (もつれこむ) - to proceed though deadlocked; to be carried over (e.g. to next meeting); to go into a shootout (e.g. sport)
もつ鍋: (もつなべ) - hot pot stew made with offal, vegetables and (often) miso
もて囃す: (もてはやす) - to praise extravagantly; to lionize; to lionise; to make much of
もて扱う: (もてあつかう) - to take care of; to be too much for one/to find unmanageable/to be beyond one's control/to not know what to do with
もて映やす: (もてはやす) - to praise extravagantly; to lionize; to lionise; to make much of
もて期: (もてき) - period (of life) when one is enjoying more romantic attention than usual
もて栄やす: (もてはやす) - to praise extravagantly; to lionize; to lionise; to make much of
もて遊ぶ: (もてあそぶ) - to play with (a toy, one's hair, etc.)/to fiddle with; to toy with (one's emotions, etc.)/to trifle with; to do with something as one pleases; to appreciate
もとに戻す: (もとにもどす) - to go back to the start; to reset; to restore; to return to the point (of a discussion); to return something (that has been moved) to previous place; to reconstitute
もとのさやに収まる: (もとのさやにおさまる) - to bury the hatchet; to make up; to be reconciled; to be reunited (e.g. couple); to be reinstated
もとのさやに納まる: (もとのさやにおさまる) - to bury the hatchet; to make up; to be reconciled; to be reunited (e.g. couple); to be reinstated
もとの鞘に収まる: (もとのさやにおさまる) - to bury the hatchet; to make up; to be reconciled; to be reunited (e.g. couple); to be reinstated
もとの鞘に納まる: (もとのさやにおさまる) - to bury the hatchet; to make up; to be reconciled; to be reunited (e.g. couple); to be reinstated
もどかしい: (modokashii) - irritante, irritado, frustrante, aborrecido, (sentindo que as coisas não são) rápidas o bastante, (sentindo que) está muito lento, (sentindo-se) impaciente, tentador, provocante
もにゃもにゃ: (もにゃもにゃ) - mumbling; incomprehensible muttering; talking with food in one's mouth; talking in sleep
もぬけの殻: (もぬけのから) - completely empty; vacant; deserted; (everything) gone
もぬけの空: (もぬけのから) - completely empty; vacant; deserted; (everything) gone
もの: (もん) - (used as a conjunction or at sentence-end, often as 〜ものな, 〜ものね) indicates reason or excuse; (at sentence-end) indicates dissatisfaction/indicates desire to be pampered or indulged
ものか: (もんか) - used to create a form of question indicating that the speaker actually believes the opposite is true; emphasizes a determination not to do something, e.g. "Like hell I will!"
ものが言えない: (ものがいえない) - speechless (with amazement); struck dumb
ものだから: (もんだから) - the reason for something
もので: (もんで) - conjunctive particle indicating a cause or reason
ものである: (ものである) - is something that; is that which
ものですか: (もんですか) - used to create a rhetorical question indicating that the speaker actually believes the opposite is true; emphasizes a determination not to do something by means of a rhetorical question
ものですから: (ものですから) - reason or excuse (nuance of seeking understanding)
ものの数ではない: (もののかずではない) - nothing special; nothing significant
ものの本: (もののほん) - some book/book about that subject; books
ものの道理: (もののどうり) - the principle of the thing
ものも言いよう: (ものもいいよう) - To make or mar depends on the telling
ものを: (ものを) - (usu. at sentence end) although (with nuance of strong discontent); but; even though; I wish ....
ものを言う: (ものをいう) - to speak (of something); to be effective/to be powerful/to mean everything
もの凄い: (ものすごい) - earth-shattering/staggering/to a very great extent; terrible/frightful/horrible/ghastly
もの好き: (ものずき) - (idle) curiosity; whimsical; (having) strange tastes
もの憂い: (ものうい) - languid; weary; listless; melancholy
もの柔らか: (ものやわらか) - mild; mild-mannered; gentle
もの言う: (ものいう) - to talk; to carry meaning
もふもふ: (もふもふ) - soft to the touch (e.g. fur, feathers); fluffy
もみじ袋: (もみじぶくろ) - rice-bran bag (used for scrubbing the skin when bathing)
もみ上げ: (もみあげ) - tuft of hair under temple; sideburns; sidelocks
もみ合う: (もみあう) - to jostle; to shove and push; to struggle with one another
もみ手で頼む: (もみででたのむ) - to supplicate; to implore humbly
もみ消す: (もみけす) - to crush/to rub out/to smother (e.g. fire)/to stub out; to hush up/to stifle/to suppress/to sponge over
もめ事: (もめごと) - quarrel; trouble; dispute; friction (between people)
ももんじ: (ももんじ) - large game (e.g. deer, boar); speaking badly of someone; squirrel-like costume for frightening children
ももんじい: (ももんじ) - large game (e.g. deer, boar); speaking badly of someone; squirrel-like costume for frightening children
ももんじい屋: (ももんじいや) - Edo-era meat vendor (esp. of large game, e.g. deer, boar); butcher
ももんじ屋: (ももんじや) - Edo-era meat vendor (esp. of large game, e.g. deer, boar); butcher
もも上げ: (ももあげ) - high knee (exercise drill where one brings one's knees up high while walking or running)
もも引き: (ももひき) - close fitting trousers; working trousers; long johns; long underpants
もやしっ子: (もやしっこ) - weak child; frail child; gangly child
もやもや: (moyamoya) - nebuloso, enevoado, com neblina, turvo, confuso; sensação de indefinição, sensação de incerteza, sentimento de tristeza, sentimento de depressão, sentimentos reprimidos, mal-estar
もやもや病: (もやもやびょう) - moyamoya disease (rare, progressive cerebrovascular disorder caused by blocked arteries in the basal ganglia)
もらい受ける: (もらいうける) - to get; to be given
もらい泣き: (もらいなき) - crying in sympathy; infectious crying
もりもり: (morimori) - (eating) heartily; energetically, vigorously, (working) hard, enthusiastically; bulging (muscles), welling up (de força, coragem, etc.)
もり蕎麦: (もりそば) - chilled soba served on a dish (often on a wicker basket or in a shallow steaming basket) with dipping sauce
もろ: (もろ) - (モロ only) Moro/Muslim inhabitant of the Philippines; conspicuously/openly; completely/entirely/perfectly/wonderfully
もろばれ: (もろばれ) - (from もろに and ばれる) obviously known; open secret
もろ刃: (もろは) - double-edged; (両刃 only) double-edged blade
もろ肌: (もろはだ) - both bare shoulders; stripped to the waist
もろ肌を脱ぐ: (もろはだをぬぐ) - to strip to one's waist; to go at with might and main
もろ肌脱ぎ: (もろはだぬぎ) - stripping to one's waist; being bare from the waist up
もん: (もん) - (used as a conjunction or at sentence-end, often as 〜ものな, 〜ものね) indicates reason or excuse; (at sentence-end) indicates dissatisfaction/indicates desire to be pampered or indulged
もんか: (もんか) - used to create a form of question indicating that the speaker actually believes the opposite is true; emphasizes a determination not to do something, e.g. "Like hell I will!"
もんじゃ焼き: (もんじゃやき) - savoury pancake with various fillings, thinner than okonomiyaki
もんだから: (もんだから) - the reason for something
もんで: (もんで) - conjunctive particle indicating a cause or reason
